RT @RepPeteAguilar For working families across this country, a college education is a bridge to the middle class.

...and I will continue fighting at the federal level for policies that make higher education more accessible, affordable, and equitable.

Today‚Äôs decision striking down  affirmative action is a loss for our increasingly diverse country and a devastating blow to fairness and equity in higher education.
